com.icodici.universa.node.network.microhttpd

Class MicroHTTPDService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.icodici.universa.node.network.microhttpd.MicroHTTPDService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasicHTTPService, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MicroHTTPDService
extends java.lang.Object
implements BasicHTTPService
    A customized version of NanoHTTPD, adapted for Universa specifics.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(int port,
                  int maxResponseThreads)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: BasicHTTPService
        Start the service in a separate thread, returns as soon as listening port will be opened. Should not return before the port is opened! Must use Executors.newFixedThreadPool for workers.
        Specified by:
        start in interface BasicHTTPService
        Parameters:
        port - is port number
        maxResponseThreads - is maximum available threads
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if port can't be open for listening

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: BasicHTTPService
        Shutdown the service and free all allocated resources. Note it must not shutdown the worker pool, instead, let it finish off normally (e.g. be finalized). Must close listening socket.
        Specified by:
        close in interface BasicHTTPService
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - for closing exceptions

      • on

        public @Nullable BasicHTTPService.Handler on(java.lang.String pathStart,
                                             BasicHTTPService.Handler handler)
        Description copied from interface: BasicHTTPService
        Register request handler which must be called if the BasicHTTPService.Request.getPath() starts with pathStart.
        Specified by:
        on in interface BasicHTTPService
        Parameters:
        pathStart - the beginning of the request's path that should be handled by this handler
        handler - to handle such requests
        Returns:
        null if there were no previous handlers bound to this request path prefix before this handler; or BasicHTTPService.Handler which was bound at this prefix before and that was overwritten.

      • onNotFound

        public @Nullable BasicHTTPService.Handler onNotFound(BasicHTTPService.Handler handler)
        Description copied from interface: BasicHTTPService
        Register request handler which must be called if there is no matching BasicHTTPService.on(String, Handler) requests found.

        By default, if no BasicHTTPService.onNotFound(Handler) handlers found, a response with 404 HTTP code and an empty body is returned.

        Specified by:
        onNotFound in interface BasicHTTPService
        Parameters:
        handler - to handle such requests
        Returns:
        null if there were no previous handlers bound to this request path prefix before this handler; or BasicHTTPService.Handler which was bound at this prefix before and that was overwritten.
